DOC.brief_summary: Observe in real life adherence therapy and time to switch in ankylosing spondylitis patients with predominant assial involvement with 4 anti-TNF.
DOC.brief_title: Assial - Anti Tnf Treatment in Ankylosing Spondylitis: an Observational Cohort Study in Italy
DOC.criteria: retrospective:12 months at least first antiTNF therapy prospective: at maximum 6 months observation AS patients with axial involvement patients in other AS studies involved
